title: Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration - Overview
description: This dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of security events in Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration, providing insights into event trends, severity levels, and threat detection. It helps monitor threats across SaaS applications and security actions for enhanced protection.

definition.content:
[Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration](https://www.checkpoint.com/harmony/email-security/) is a security solution that protects cloud-based email and collaboration platforms from cyber threats like malware, phishing, and data loss.

**Overview** dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of security events in Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration, providing insights into event trends, severity levels, and threat detection. It helps monitor threats across SaaS applications and security actions for enhanced protection.

For more information, see the [Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/checkpoint_harmony_email_and_collaboration/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Events by Customer Domains and Regions

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration Security Events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals, please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
